title: Family Tree the Novel: Family Tree
description: Angel Harper has been arrested her driver's license is suspended, jail is the least of her worries. There has been an emergency in her family, anxious to see her son who found Angel's sister. After she commits suicide two weeks into Angel's sentence, struggling with a long history of drug and alcohol abuse. Granted a stay of sentencing, returning to jail in four days setting the stage. What happens next in this emotionally charged story, is compelling and thought provoking. While building to an unpredictable ending.Retired book title, original language intended was french.poor translation retired the title after, language was restored to english.
author: Andrea N. Carr
